name: Stick Archer RPG V3
description:
• Play as a stick-man archer to defeat all monsters in his way.
  • Different monsters with unique abilities
  • Over 25  stages/maps
  • Level up and increase your stats and purchase new abilities to make yourself stronger.
  • Save and load games in 3 different slots
  • Use a sword instead of a bow sometimes
  • This game may lag in the browser. Please download the game for the best gaming experience.

How to play:

Press 'z' to attack

Press space-bar to jump

Use the arrow-keys to walk
